MissionCharter.Description: A document that outlines the North Star, mission, objectives, scope, stakeholders, and high-level plans for the team. Provides a short, descriptive summary of key objectives and the impact on stakeholders.
MissionCharter.Purpose: To provide a clear and shared understanding of team mission and goals.
MissionCharter.Objective: Build a mobile self-checkout system and innovate new purchasing methods for customers.
MissionCharter.Impact: Enhance customer experience and streamline the purchasing process.

ValuesStatements.Description: A collection of single sentences or short phrases that make the reader feel engaged and connected which describe the team's culture, including values, ethics, responsibility, character, love, and joy.
Values: Customer-Centric: We prioritize our customers' needs.
Innovation: We embrace creativity and new ideas.
Responsibility: We take ownership of our work.
Collaboration: We work together towards common goals.
Integrity: We uphold the highest standards of transparency and ethics.

KPIsAndMetrics.Description: Real-time report containing the objective measurements that hold the team accountable to achieving its mission and project goals efficiently according to its values.

Metrics.Transaction Error Rate: Percentage of transactions that encounter issues.
Metrics.User Adoption Rate: Percentage of customers using the mobile self-checkout.

RequirementsDocumentation.Description: Detailed requirements, user stories, or use cases that define what needs to be achieved.
ExampleRequirements: As a shopper, I want to scan items quickly so that I can save time during checkout.
As a customer, I want to view my total price in real-time, so I know my spending.

DesignDocuments.Description: Detailed designs for specific components or features, including mockups, wireframes, technical specifications, and visual architecture diagrams.
DesignDocuments.Mockups: Link to design wireframes for mobile self-checkout

ProjectPlan.Description: A timeline or roadmap outlining key milestones, deliverables, and deadlines.

MeetingCadences.Description: Summaries of routinely scheduled meetings including discussions, decisions, and action items from meetings.

CommunicationPlan.Description: A strategy for how the teams will communicate internally and externally, including tools, frequency, channels, and customer support.
CommunicationPlan.Frequency: Daily status updates on Slack, Weekly team meetings via Microsoft Teams
CommunicationPlan.Channels: Designated channels for ongoing discussions and feedback.

ProgressReports.Description: Regular updates on the status of the team toward KPIs and Metrics, including completed tasks, upcoming work, and any issues or risks.

CodeRepositories.Description: Shared repositories for storing and managing source code.

TestPlansAndTestCases.Description: Documentation of the testing strategy, including test cases, expected results, and test environments.

DeploymentProcesses.Description: Methodologies, processes, scripts and configuration for deploying the application or system components.
DeploymentProcesses.ProcessDetails: Use Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) pipeline strategies for efficient delivery.

UserDocumentation.Description: Guides, manuals, or help files for end-users.

TechnicalDocumentation.Description: In-depth documentation of the system's technical aspects, including APIs, data models, and integration points.

ContinuousImprovementReports.Description: Summaries of retrospective-derived insights including lessons learned, successes, team member shout-outs, upcoming risks, and areas for improvement.

Structure.ActionItems: Summary of opportunities for change based on provided feedback.

Feedback.Start: Start conducting regular customer feedback sessions.
Feedback.Continue: Continue to foster an open and collaborative team environment.
